Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending an exclusive offer for $110. This is a special opportunity to acquire it at a price slightly above its cost to us, ensuring you receive the best value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We're confident it will meet your expectations and exceed your needs. Please let us know if you're interested. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
